meanings.definition: Located or occurring at a tableside.
meanings.sent1: The tableside lamp provided a cozy glow in the room.
meanings.sent2: The tableside flowers added a touch of elegance to the dining experience.
meanings.sent3: The tableside chair seemed to be whispering secrets to the other furniture.
meanings.sent4: The tableside view from the window was like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The tableside decorations made the whole room feel welcoming and warm.

meanings.definition: Done or served at a tableside.
meanings.sent1: The tableside salad was freshly prepared right in front of us.
meanings.sent2: The tableside dessert flambe was a spectacular show of culinary skill.
meanings.sent3: The tableside magician turned our empty plates into a feast of delights.
meanings.sent4: The tableside service made us feel like royalty dining in a palace.
meanings.sent5: The tableside cooking experience was both delicious and entertaining.
